basics.name: Andrei L
basics.label: Principal Engineer at Jagaad
basics.summary: I'm a full-stack developer who blends clean architecture with real-world impact. Whether it's Vue/Nuxt, React/Next.js, or Node.js, I build scalable systems that just work. With sharp skills in Docker, Strapi, and DevOps, I'm as comfortable in CI/CD pipelines as I am optimizing user flows.

work.name: Jagaad
work.summary: Worked on diverse projects using modern technologies, implementing DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines to streamline development. Ensured high-quality code and efficient delivery through strong team management and collaboration.

work.name: Arya Guest House (Jagaad)
work.summary: Contributed to a smart accommodation platform by developing contactless check-in, smart room controls, and IoT integration. Built scalable backend services with Strapi and Node.js, responsive frontends with Vue.js and Astro, and improved reliability through modular design and strong typing‚Äîall aimed at enhancing guest experience and host efficiency.

work.name: Weebora (Jagaad)
work.summary: Built a trip-building web application with a Nuxt (SSR) frontend and Strapi backend, integrated Stripe for secure payments, developed a Nezasa API client, and optimized workflows for better developer experience.

work.name: Aptus.AI (Jagaad)
work.summary: Led a remote engineering team through the full development lifecycle, applying Agile methodologies, collaborating with stakeholders, mentoring developers, and ensuring high code quality through reviews and testing.

work.name: BonusX (Jagaad)
work.summary: Developed a microservice using NestJS to apply digital signatures to PDF documents. Integrated with MQTT for communication within a microservices architecture. Deployed to AWS with a focus on scalability and reliability.

work.name: Jagaad Academy
work.summary: Helped establish Jagaad Academy by developing its official website, creating frontend course content, and collaborating on curriculum and educational materials.

work.name: Airbit
work.summary: Developed and maintained Vue/Nuxt projects using the Composition API and TypeScript, built a core components library, and enhanced data interactions with GraphQL and Apollo Client.

work.name: MUUME (Winify AG)
work.summary: Gained extensive experience across a wide range of technologies by developing full-stack applications with React, Angular, and WordPress, managing a large TYPO3 site, and working with Java, Scala, and Spring. Built browser extensions and email templates, implemented CI/CD pipelines, contributed to frontend development with modern frameworks, supported QA with Selenium and Cypress, and used Git for version control.

work.name: Endava
work.summary: Built an Evernote-style app in Objective-C and developed an iOS game using Swift and SpriteKit.

work.name: CosmoThemes
work.summary: Developed and maintained WordPress themes and plugins, provided technical support, and managed collaboration using SVN.

volunteer.summary: Led technical initiatives, managed open-source projects, and collaborated with community volunteers.
Oversaw technical development, mentored contributors, and drove project success.
Helped with graphic design for various projects, contributing to community initiatives focused on children.
